name: King Soccer Manager
description:
King Soccer Manger, a new exciting 3D multiplayer soccer game!
Customize your own National Team, manage it and lead to the glory against players from all over the world.

FEATURES:
- Customize you team name, colors, tactic and players
- An easy to learn but full featured 3D arcade gameplay
- Off-line quick matches to practice.
- Realtime multiplayer game against friends or random opponents
- Worldwide leaderboard and achievements

LET'S PLAY COACH!!!
